QuestData.Title: Friends in Cages
QuestData.Description:
<Korine stomps her foot and refuses to move.>
They put my friends in cages!
Make the bad men stop hurting them! They take them out the garden and they never come back!
<Korine gestures stubbornly toward the door.>
I am not going home until they do!
QuestData.LogDescription: Release 3 Nightborne Citizens from their captivity.
QuestData.RewardText: You let them go? I'm glad. I didn't like being in a cage either...
